name: Nomik Legal
brief: I was responsible for front-end development and SEO optimization of the Nomik Legal website, built using React.js, Next.js, and Node.js.

roles.name: Frontend Development
content: Built responsive, user-friendly pages using React.js and Next.js.
Implemented reusable components for consistent design and faster development.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and smooth animations for better UX.

roles.name: SEO Development
content: Added structured metadata, OpenGraph, and Twitter cards for improved social sharing.
Implemented canonical URLs, multi-languages alternates, and robots directives.
Integrated Google Ads and Google Analytics tracking to measure traffic and ad performance.
Optimized page structure and performance for better search engine ranking.

name: Eza Corporate
brief: A modern corporate website built with Vue.js and Nuxt.js, featuring a clean design, responsive layout, smooth animations, and strong SEO.

roles.name: UI/UX Design
content: Designed a clean and professional corporate-style interface.
Created responsive layouts ensuring seamless experience across mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Focused on user-friendly navigation and visual hierarchy to improve usability.

roles.name: Frontend Development
content: Built the website using Vue.js and Nuxt.js, leveraging component-based architecture.
Implemented file-based routing, interactive sliders, and smooth animations.
Ensured modular, scalable, and maintainable code structure.
Optimized page structure and performance for better search engine ranking.

roles.name: SEO Development
content: Utilized Nuxt SSR/SSG for better indexing and search visibility.
Optimized images, metadata, and site speed for Lighthouse SEO scores.
Applied clean semantic HTML for accessibility and SEO best practices.

name: CI Tech
brief: A responsive web application built with React.js, featuring a W3 Forms integration for secure and user-friendly form submissions. Focused on clean UI, smooth UX, and reliable performance across devices.

roles.name: Frontend Development
content: Built a responsive React.js application with clean and modular components.
Implemented interactive form handling using W3 Forms for reliable submissions and validation.
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and smooth performance across devices.

name: Alam Engaz
brief: A modern corporate site built with Vue.js and Nuxt.js, fully designed in Figma and developed with a focus on responsive UI, smooth UX, and SEO optimization for better performance and visibility.

roles.name: UI/UX Design
content: Crafted high-fidelity mockups and interactive prototypes using Figma, aligning the visual identity with brand values for logistics and warehousing services.
Structured clean, intuitive layouts ensuring ease of use for all visitors—especially on mobile and tablet devices.

roles.name: Frontend Development
content: Built the site using Vue.js and Nuxt.js, leveraging SSR/SSG to deliver robust performance and fast initial load times.
Created reusable components (service cards, navigation, hero sections, contact forms) to maintain design consistency and development efficiency.
Ensured responsiveness, cross-browser compatibility, and polished UI interactions (animations/transitions) to elevate user experience.

roles.name: SEO Optimization
content: Integrated SEO best practices using Nuxt features such as <head> meta tags, dynamic metadata per page, optimized images, and canonical URLs.
Supported discoverability through structured content, possibly including sitemap/robots.txt setup and proper schema or OpenGraph tags.
